TopicTitle: Things for us to do while waiting for 0.25

Articles.Content: Here's a list of things for us to do while waiting for 0.25. Answer the poll and say why you chose that answer.

i will do none of those things. my computer is not currently capable of playing games because of dying gpu fan.

however i will putting together a new rig in the next 2-3 weeks, and i will be hammering out my parts list in the mean time.
I will continue my 0.24 career until I feel that it is safe to port it over to 0.25.

Well, I'm playing KSP. On .25, as I also do experimental testing.

(yes I'm allowed to say that I'm in the team. last time I checked.)
